backend/main.mo: Motoko actor storing reservations in a map with creation and lookup functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of frontend components, sections, hooks, and assets.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining color tokens, dark mode values, and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry file with SEO metadata and root mount point for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component composing all site sections, navbar, footer, and toaster notifications.
frontend/src/components/booking/Reservat: Reservation form component with validation, loading states, and submission to backend via hook.
frontend/src/components/contact/MapEmbed: OpenStreetMap iframe embed with styled container and fallback message.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryL: Modal lightbox supporting navigation, keyboard controls, and image display.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer with restaurant info, navigation links, social icons, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/Navbar.ts: Responsive navbar with scroll-based styling and desktop/mobile navigation that triggers smooth scrolling to sections.
frontend/src/components/menu/MenuCard.ts: Displays a menu item card with hover animations, category, description, price, and optional featured badge.
frontend/src/components/three/FoodHeroSc: Three.js scene rendering animated warm-lit 3D shapes representing food-themed elements with reduced-motion support.
frontend/src/components/three/useReduced: Hook that tracks the user's prefers-reduced-motion setting via a media query.
frontend/src/data/gallery.ts: Exports gallery image metadata including paths, alt text, and captions.
frontend/src/data/menu.ts: Defines menu item types and a list of dishes with descriptions, prices, categories, and featured flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
Hook that calls the backend to create reservations with loading state, deduping, and user-friendly error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks to manage Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and authentication state.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining CSS variables, dark theme, typography, and utility layers.
frontend/src/lib/scrollToSection.ts: Smooth-scroll helper that offsets scroll position based on the fixed navbar height.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and rendering the app.
frontend/src/sections/BookingSection.tsx: Renders the booking section with a header and embeds the ReservationForm component.
frontend/src/sections/ContactSection.tsx: Displays contact information and a map embed, including address, phone, and hours.
frontend/src/sections/GallerySection.tsx: Shows a grid of gallery images with captions and opens a lightbox when an image is selected.
frontend/src/sections/HeroSection.tsx: Provides the hero section with background image, 3D canvas scene, and navigation buttons.
frontend/src/sections/MenuSection.tsx: Displays a menu section that lists menu items using MenuCard components.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, features, and pending feature requests for the production deployment.
